mapper.select: SELECT * FROM mbd_faq ORDER BY faq_idx DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mbd_faq (faq_idx, faq_title, faq_contents) VALUES (mbd_faq_seq.nextval, #{faq_title}, #{faq_contents})
mapper.update: UPDATE mbd_faq SET faq_title = #{faq_title}, faq_contents = #{faq_contents} WHERE faq_idx = #{faq_idx}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM mbd_faq WHERE faq_idx= ${ faq_idx }
